CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 6, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Pennsy Brakeman - William R. Pace Jr., newest member of the Brotherhood of Railway Trainmen and Brakemen, climbs aboard one of the trains on which he will be a member of the crew, following his recent hiring as the first Negro brakeman at the Conway Yards of the Pennsylvania Railroad. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pennsylvania Railroad brakeman William R. Pace Jr. standing on steps of Pennsylvania Railroad car no. 477382, in Conway Yards
